body: Planes with this trait are mostly solid. Travelers who arrive run the risk of suffocation if they don't reach a cavern or other pocket within the earth. Worse yet, individuals without the ability to burrow are entombed in the earth and must dig their way out (5 feet per turn). Creatures of the air subtype are uncomfortable on earth-dominant planes because these planes are tight and claustrophobic to them, but suffer no inconvenience beyond having difficulty moving.
url: pfsrd://Game Mastery Guide/Rules/Planar Adventures/Planar Traits/Elemental and Energy Traits/Earth-Dominant
name: Earth-Dominant
